title: Sam Plays the Game
summary:
**Learn the Pokémon TCG the Fun Way, with Manga!**

This guide-manga makes the brand-new Pokémon Card Game: Scarlet & Violet easy to learn.
Meet rookie players Retsuto and Retsuhito. Follow their adventures, enjoy the comics, and watch your own Poké-card skills soar!

(Source: Amazon Japan, edited)

title: Teach Me Desire
summary:
Saintess Beryl, who must identify the demon among the three families possessing inhuman power and influence. Only her divine power can reveal who the demon truly is.

"Who will you marry?"

To escape from the two previous hellish lives, Beryl chooses Duke Vine, who is the real demon. She does this to survive and possibly exact cruel revenge on those who killed her.

Thus, Beryl enters the demon's castle. Having learned only how to restrain her desires at the temple, Beryl now learns from the unholy and tempting demon Vine how to truly desire...!

title: The Wild Rose Embraces the Frost
Things I Learned After Death
summary: As if being framed by her love for plotting a murder weren't enough, Rinette learns that her stepsister, Kanna, is the true mastermind behind it all. As she's burned at the stake, Rinette makes a desperate wish for another chance...and wakes up as her younger self. Determined to change her fate, she vows to stop Kanna's schemes and protect her family this time around. But rewriting the past is far from simple. Each choice she makes brings unforeseen consequences—some more devastating than she could imagine. Can Rinette escape the shadows of her past, or will they consume her once more?

title: Perhaps Invincible
summary: Hyeol Yu is a third-rate warrior feared more for his menacing appearance than his actual skills. Branded by false rumors and endless misunderstandings, he has long been an outcast in the world of martial arts. But everything changes when Seolhwa, the woman he once vowed his life to, reappears before him as a true martial arts master. From that moment on, Hyeol is thrust into chaos, his name weaving its way through the ranks of warriors, sects, and factions. As his unwanted reputation spirals out of control, he is pulled into a conflict far greater than he ever imagined.

title: I Want to Live Life Effortlessly
summary: A boy named Atsumu was branded as "useless" by his famous sisters and banished from his entertainment-industry family. However, hidden within him was an extraordinarily talented "behind-the-scenes support" skill that neither he nor his family had noticed! After transferring schools, Atsumu is now determined to live a normal life, but as he crosses paths with talented entertainers—VTubers, idols, and models—his natural ability starts to shine, making him their indispensable support. They can't help but adore him, turning his simple wish for normality into a showbiz underdog success story!

title: A Capable Maid
summary:
As Maurina, she's on the run as the last of her kingdom’s royal line. Disguised as Marie, she is just a maid, serving the victorious empire. She’s never been very good at anything, so when she's told to make a wish, she asks for the ability to help others and bring them happiness. Now as visions of brilliant and skilled people fill her dreams, she’s imbued with a bounty of abilities perfectly suited for any dilemma. But will her secrets last as the crown prince seeks out both Maurina and Marie?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53159698)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/a-talented-maid/info)
* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647461)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Marie-Sang-Pelayan-Berbakat/3337)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/35253)

title: When The Phone Rings
summary:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?

title: Twelve Zodiac Girls
summary:
In the race to determine the Zodiac gods, Nina the cat ranked 13th and failed to be chosen.
Because of Nina, the Zodiac race begins again for the first time in thousands of years, and the Twelve Gods descend into the world.

A seductive and lovely, full-fledged superpower fantasy girl action story!!

title: Trillions of Resources in Apocalypse
summary: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
summary:
In the VRMMORPG Versus Online, Kazuya was known as the Fist King. But when he defeated the Labyrinth King Pharaoh, he woke up and had somehow been transported back to when he was 12 years old! Moreover, this world is a game world where monsters exist?! However, he can no longer use his once-invincible fists, and his stats are all at beginner level. For now, Ichiyo starts by practicing swinging a wooden staff for eight hours a day...

In a world where heavy weapons reign supreme, he aims to become the strongest by utilizing analog weapons, his fists, and the cheat skills he alone knows from the game world!

title: My Younger Sister Chooses Me Tonight
summary:
Arin, the adopted daughter of a chaebol family, harbours a twisted affection for her stepmother. After she becomes an adult, Arin accidentally realises that she has unusual abilities.
She tries to use her abilities to attract her stepmother's attention, but her stepbrothers, not her stepmother, want Arin...

A dangerous adopted daughter who shakes up the conglomerate 'Rare Moon' family. Her twisted red romance!

title: It’s Okay If You Don’t Love Me
summary:
Comics Underground Japan presents the wild, subversive world of Japan’s most accomplished underground comics artists. Some of the dozen artists included in this anthology will be familiar to followers of manga; others make their American debut in these pages. The richly imaginative stories in this volume show a great range of graphic style, from painstakingly detailed craftsmanship to exuberant, maniacal renderings. At the heart of each work in this anthology is a unique personal vision and a fierce artistic compulsion–these manga artists are the misfits of the art form, and they are its visionaries.  
  
Included stories are:  
1. "Hell's Angel" by Yoshikazu Ebisu  
2. "It's All Right if You Don't Understand" by Yoshikazu Ebisu  
3. "Steel Pipe Melancholia" by Masakazu Toma  
4. "Future Sperm Brazil" by Takashi Nemoto  
5. "A Love Like Lemons" by Carol Shimoda  
6. "Selfish Carol's Summer Vacation" by Carol Shimoda  
7. "Mercy Flesh (Jiniku)" by Kazuichi Hanawa  
8. "Don Quixote #1 & #2" by Yasuji Tanioka  
9. "Planet of the Jap" by Suehiro Maruo  
10. "Mary’s Asshole" by Hanako Yamada  
11. "Volvox" by Pan Migawa  
12. "Bigger and Better" by Muddy Wehara  
13. "Laughing Ball" by Hideshi Hino  
14. "Cat Noodle Soup" by Hajime Yamano & Nekojiro

title: Hello! Veterinarian!
summary:
**Original Webtoon:**
[KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62711843), [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%88%98%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC%EB%8B%98-%EC%95%88%EB%85%95%ED%95%98%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/3732)

title: The Godly Son-in-Law of the Nation
summary: Five years ago, his father’s company was framed by someone, and he lost his money. Jiang Beichen suffered humiliation in front of his relatives in order to treat his father’s illness, and was even ruthlessly abandoned by his fiancee, and finally sank into the river. Five years later, he added glory to his body and returned strong. Not only did he sweep away all abuses and avenge his father, but he also stood on the top of Kyushu, overlooking the world.

title: Expelled Hero Is Too Strong
summary:
"Shall we go on an adventure, like in the old days?"

Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenly came to visit him. 

"Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled." 

Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. 

"Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!" 

And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…

title: Don’t Tell Me You Think Cultivating Immortality Is Difficult?
summary: A humble rookie seeks the path to immortality — only to accidentally join a sect full of pretentious con artists. His seven senior brothers brim with confidence, taking turns spouting out fabricated divine techniques. But no one expected this newcomer to be a genius. He actually comprehends everything — even their nonsense! In the end, the master falls into despair. Just who is this junior disciple?

title: Constellations of the Gods [Official]
summary:
The nation's buzzing about Ahn Suho, the newly awakened player who's giving up a life of riches to become a civil servant. They don't realize that Suho's been a civil servant before... in his past life before he was killed by his own team! 

Now, Suho's out to save the country from the worst of its criminal scum by gaining the strength to stop them before they can strike. 

Can Suho power up and protect the nation, even if it means starting over completely? Or will justice be thwarted once more?

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: My Kidnapper Is My Arranged Marriage Partner?!
summary: After gaining her long-awaited fox form (but losing her human shape), a white fox beastkin escapes kidnapping, only to face her captor again at a mandatory royal matchmaking. The wolf who once dragged her away now sits across the tea table, smirking.

title: Merry Marbling
summary: When he was young, Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then, Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon, who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building, could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival, Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly, Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However, Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it, Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know, whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water, these two create a beautiful dissonance.

title: The Princess Blooms as a Crazy Flower
summary:
An outcast from the imperial family due to her freewheeling attitude and refusal to get married, Princess Melody Corbella wants nothing more than to live life on her own terms and protect the people of the empire. Using her secret powers to sneak out of the palace to influence affairs from behind the scenes, she ends up drawing the attention of the handsome imperial guard, Caisar Bethel. Though she avoided romance until now, could love finally bloom for this crazy flower?

---
“I, Melody Corbella, wish to marry him!” The rest of the table reacted in a cold enough manner for the Princess to feel ashamed, having raised her right arm vigorously with sparkles in her eyes.

And then, Prince Deimos broke the silence to open his mouth, “We must not send a nutcase like her, Your Majesty!!”

It was finally the moment where all of her crazy deeds in the past came to fruition; because the only way she could escape being sent off for Royal Marriage was to throw away the image of a Princess that everyone expected.

She chose to cut her hair short and be reborn as the Crazy Flower in the Royal Palace.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/melody-the-crazy-flower-blooms/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14188)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4822)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4670)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4619)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112771)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4860)

title: The Duchess’s Secret Dressing Room
summary:
*How much money must I spend for you to divorce me?!*

Rubika dies in a war without being able to confess her love for Arman but is instead sent back in time. A new life, she will not live in vain. But what are these new obstacles?

---
*'If I had known sooner that life would never wait, I wouldn't have hesitated so much...'*

After living a hard life in the ravaged war ruins, Rubica dies without even confessing to her beloved Armand.

But what is this?

At the age of 22, with Armand’s ring, Rubica returned to the pre-war period. After returning, Rubica tries to find Armand who may be alive but is caught by the proposal of her kingdom's supreme ruler, the Duke of Claymore.

Rubica, who eventually became the duchess because of her greedy uncle and aunt, now plans to squander her husband's fortune, be disgraced as a 'luxurious duchess,’ and get him to divorce her.

However, contrary to what she intended, her fame rises due to her overflowing talent, and her husband, who she thought was indifferent to her, slowly begins to take an interest in her... Where is the end of her luxury, which began to flow in a direction she never expected?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16662/)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)

title: In the Doghouse
summary: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: I’m Stuck On The Same Day For A Thousand Years
summary:
Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
——The time is: July 8, 2020

title: After Prison: The Real Heiress Claps Back
Archmage Streamer
summary:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

Note: "BJ" is a Korean slang that means streamer. It stands for Bang-Jang (방장).

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)

title: The End of a Fake Marriage
summary: When Miyagi, the head of a well-established Japanese restaurant, is confessed to by Kasuga, a chef-in-training visiting from a sister restaurant, the next day and every day after invites continuous sexual advances! Even as he struggles to resist Kasuga's proposals, what will happen as Miyagi becomes moved by Kasuga's unwavering attempts?!

title: I Saved You, but I’m Not Responsible
summary:
I was the one abandoned, yet I seem to have grown up the most mentally stable! 

I was ordered to serve my fake counterpart as her maid, so I decided to go undercover. But something's off with my former family. Whatever, it's not my problem! So, I just focused on my task... 

"Are you really not going to live with us?"

The eldest, who used to show obsessive control over the fake, started acting strangely toward me. 
"I never thought I’d feel such camaraderie and trust with the opposite sex. You’re strangely too comfortable." 

The second brother, who was on the brink of falling into darkness, managed to get back on track thanks to me. 
"I didn’t come here to help them film their regret-filled family drama." 

I tried to ignore everything and quickly moved on to my next mission… but why do I keep running into people whose lives are completely messed up? 

Why is everyone in perfect need of saving?

title: I’m the Main Character’s Child
summary:
---
**Note:**
- This manga contains storyboard drafts the author created for Jump Magazine to be considered for serialization. [Source](https://x.com/kuzushinsetsu/status/742325718541967360)

**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/14502453/series/57948) (Note: The chapter order is reversed), [Niconico Redirect](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/21927)

title: Quiet in the Office!
summary: In the kingdom Lutz lived in until now, commoners were unable to climb up the social ladder, their efforts were denied and extra work disregarded. Lutz finally got fed up, and decided to move to the Empire, which was a complete meritocracy. It was a wonderful country where hard work and creativity was valued. Moreover, Lutz's special magic, which was seen to be useless in the kingdom, is able to beat platoon level monsters in the Empire! Lutz decides to set off in this new land, where values are upheld, rewards are given, and there's a simple path to get ahead in life!

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: I’d Rather Live as a Villain
summary: Kanda Hajime, an avid gamer and overworked office worker, collapses from exhaustion—only to wake up as Ridd, the villain of the otome game "TokiRella"! Awaiting him is an unavoidable fate: condemnation and ruin. Determined to escape this grim ending, Ridd leverages his sharp intellect and deep knowledge of the game to rewrite his destiny. His first goal? Mending his broken family—a cold, distant father, a lonely sister, and a bedridden mother. But as he sets out to change their fates, his actions ripple far beyond the game’s original story, igniting a revolution that will shake the entire continent!

title: Reincarnator
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: Choose Me, Flora
summary:
"At the same day and hour, three children who should not be born will be born. Among them, one child holds everyone’s fate; depending on that child’s choice, one family will be annihilated and the child will die in the child’s own form. I, Theodoric, stake everything and curse this."

Like a curse, at that same day and hour, Mikael, Ezra, and Flora are born.

The three, as if by predetermined fate, eventually come face to face, and Flora must choose between the two...

title: You are pretty
summary: This is the typical protagonist setting so my cheats should be coming, right! Unexpectedly, that night, my fiancée suddenly took back her words: I won’t annul this marriage! I want us to live and sleep together! I’ll also take care of all our living expenses! Okay, let’s do it, I have nothing to lose anyway. After one night… Eh, there’s something a bit wrong with my fiancée?

title: Baby Pharmacist Princess
summary:
Just by clicking the wrong button, I ended up possessing the game's princess character, "Cherise"! Yoon Che-ri, a graduate of a pharmaceutical university. Like the so-called 'hardcore gamer' she is, She unexpectedly appears in the VR game she plays every day. A red rabbit puts her in debt to the game, owing 10 billion gems...

If she doesn't repay the debt of 10 billion gems, she won't be able to log out?

♡ Surprise Quest Triggered ♡

User's ability confirmed as "Pharmaceuticals," customized settings have been completed accordingly. Future quests will focus on "Pharmaceuticals."

[Confirm] ◀

Huh? Why do I feel excessively capable...? If things go on like this, I might be able to return soon!
Will Cherise really be able to settle the 10 billion gem debt and return to her original world?

title: Newcomers Turn Low at Night
summary:
With a handsome face and manners that would put a diplomat to shame, new hire Lee Hyeonu is a sight for sore eyes to Senior Manager Shin Iyeon when he walks through the doors of Hanshin Worldwide. 

Feeling like she’s won the lottery, Iyeon is looking forward to her company life alongside this polite and hard-working young man— 

"Hey, Iyeon. Get this done by tomorrow." 

Hyeonu is no regular employee; he’s the son of the CEO. And as he begins to show his true nasty nature behind closed doors, Iyeon begins wondering what she did to deserve him.

title: Food Truck Owner Inside the Dungeon
summary:
"Don't yearn for a world different from yours, just live a normal life."

Hunters, dungeons, I'm not interested in any of them.
My life followed one single path that's of cooking.
But the moment I was about to open my first long-awaited food truck....

[Class: You have awakened as a Food Truck Owner (Hidden)!]
[Item: Dungeon Business Permit (Personal/Non-Transferable)!]
- Business is only possible inside the dungeon

Min Jiun, 21 years old, awakened as the owner of a food truck inside the dungeon.

title: No More Regrets, Just Kill Me
summary:
Tsukishiro Yuina, a singer who lost her voice in a traffic accident, felt hopeless. In her despair, Yuina chose to end her life, but when she opened her eyes, she found herself in the world of a novel she had read before her death, The Saint Who Abandons Her Status.

She had possessed the body of the novel's villainess, Ariadeline. To make matters worse, it was at the point where the main protagonists were already married, and Ariadeline had been condemned.

Even in the world of the novel, her miserable situation didn't improve. Yuina (now Ariadeline) decided to take her own life again, but this time she was stopped by her former husband, Carlothian.

"I don't want you to die."

Even though he was the one who killed her in the original story, Carlothian repeatedly interfered with Ariadeline's attempts to end her life.

"Why won't you kill me like you did in the original story...?"

Thus begins the tale of the villainess who lost her dream, Ariadeline, and her tsundere former husband, Carlothian, as they attempt to redo their misunderstood love story.

title: Bloody Marriage
summary:
Scarlett was a happy girl. With beautiful looks, a wealthy family, and even a kind fiancé, Scarlett was expected to be the most beautiful bride in the world. But on the morning of her wedding day, the pure-white bride was killed by someone. When she opened her eyes again, everything was different.   
  
"I've told you many times before. It's because I'm Scarlett Antwerp!"   
  
"I'm sorry, but the Esteemed Daughter of the Count, Lady Entwerp, is already dead."   
  
Waking up in a strange place, Scarlett could not understand what had happened to her. Why couldn't anyone recognize her? Why was her fiancé standing next to another woman? Why was she Vivian instead of Scarlett, the Esteemed Daughter of the Count? Why was the one next to her not her fiancé Edward, but Alexis, the police chief? Scarlett swore that she'd get her fiancé back and get revenge on the one who killed her.

title: I Want to Live a Good Life
summary: In the kingdom Lutz lived in until now, commoners were unable to climb up the social ladder, their efforts were denied and extra work disregarded. Lutz finally got fed up, and decided to move to the Empire, which was a complete meritocracy. It was a wonderful country where hard work and creativity was valued. Moreover, Lutz's special magic, which was seen to be useless in the kingdom, is able to beat platoon level monsters in the Empire! Lutz decides to set off in this new land, where values are upheld, rewards are given, and there's a simple path to get ahead in life!

title: Say the spell, Rose!
summary: A spinoff focusing on Princess Piña's life before the Gate's opening.
